title: [Epic] Profile Showcase

milestone.title: 2.28.0 Beta
milestone.description:
## Messaging & Communities team 

**1. Continue to fix bugs and stabilise chat and communities functionality as top priority**
- includes any issues found during dogfooding

**2. Status Communities / Discord bridge**
- Ensure bridge works with token gated communities (e.g. permission is set at the community level that requires a token to be held to be a member of that community)
- Ensure bridge works with token gated channels
- On the Status Desktop side, individual messages from Discord are displayed as individual messages with Discord usernames

**3. Continue work on profile showcase**

**4. Ability to mark a token gated channel as 'hidden'**
- A token gated channel that's marked as 'hidden' is only visible to community members that have the requisite tokens to access this channel
- Design for this is completed

**5. Community encryption change to support KeycardPro/Status Web**
- Patryk on point, to work with Michelle and Cammellos

**6. Ability to select any Collectable that exists when setting up a Community permission**
- So communities aren't limited to just using collectables the community itself has minted
- Designs already done for this I think, this functionality was discussed with MichaelC last year

**7. Fix user flow bugs, better handle edgecases and other improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- Banning / unbanning and kicking: graceful support of edgecases and improvements**




 

## Wallet Team

**1. Fixing bugs, stabilisation of existing functionality**
- 0.17 will be our 1st or 2nd public beta release, so squashing bugs is the top priority
- Includes fully testing Keycard on Windows and fixing any outstanding Windows Keycard issues

**2. Collectables - support graceful support of edgecases and improvements**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues

**3. Other wallet improvements and improved edgecase support**
- Ben to provide designs and links to all associated issues
- QR code display updates
- Showing user which permissions they loose when they remove an account
- flow for restart required  for JSON RPC change to take effect

**4. Finish improved 'saved accounts' functionality and 'share address' dialogue**

# [WIP Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-13865&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0) - [Actual Design](https://www.figma.com/file/ibJOTPlNtIxESwS96vJb06/%F0%9F%91%A4-Profile-%7C-Desktop?type=design&node-id=2460-8755&mode=design&t=jumwFduKExodhRUc-0)

## Bugs
- [ ] #13329

## General

- [ ] #13330
There are two main points:
    1. Each section of the current profile settings view needs to be moved into the corresponding tab. 
    2. The `Preview` tab becomes the `Preview` button
- [ ] #13331

## Identity

## Assets

- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets&Collectibles] Update assets and collectibles delegate to include community badge when the token is a community one. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=315%3A158538&mode=design&t=Vhmjjhy5qjG1w5HW-1)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets] Add link to Accounts tab. The Assets selection available in the showcase is composed of all the assets owned by the visible accounts. This makes it clear that updating the visible accounts will also update the Assets selection available to showcase. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-160056&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets&Collectibles] Implement the `Intro popup` and show it on the first dirty state of Assets or Collectibles tab [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-177899&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Assets] Sort on drop/insert based on current balance [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-170380&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)

## Collectibles

- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles] Add link to Accounts tab [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-172408&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles&Assets] Explore whether the assets/collectibles filtering should happen on the backend or UI based on the accounts selected to showcase and/or Tokens management settings.
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles&Assets] Sync the drop area options with the visible accounts selection. E.g Account visible to Contacts only -> Assets and Collectibles from that account can only be dropped to Contacts and Verified. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-189089&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Collectibles&Assets] Sync the context menu with the visible accounts selection. Add tooltip and disable [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=1-31423&mode=design&t=gxavA5yTTwXWFu9s-0)

## Profile Popup
Meaning it as the popup shown when `previewing` but also the popup shown when looking at someone's `profile`.
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Profile Popup] General layout updates: Review new design, there are some details updated (buttons, combobox for different perspectives..). [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=3%3A225494&mode=design&t=CgPjnkYd4s20ND7R-1)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Profile Popup] Work on the new scroll behavior. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=5%3A88353&mode=design&t=CgPjnkYd4s20ND7R-1)
- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Profile Popup] Interactions. Review all different delegate cards for each tab and check if there are design updates. At least there are different context menu option for these cards. (Probably this task can be splitted by card type, i.e. one task for the communities card, one for the assets, card, one for the account,  one for the collectibles and one for the web cards. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=5%3A99191&mode=design&t=CgPjnkYd4s20ND7R-1)

- [ ] [Profile Showcase - Profile Popup] Review own profile details. Now QR code is a new popup. [Design](https://www.figma.com/file/d0G7m8X6ELjQlFOEKQpn1g/Profile-WIP?type=design&node-id=124%3A113320&mode=design&t=CgPjnkYd4s20ND7R-1)
